alert.note: Alert for Pima; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 6:56PM MST until July 26 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... South central Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 745 PM MST. * At 656 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Catalina State Park, or over Oro Valley, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Catalina, Oro Valley, Marana, Casas Adobes, Saddlebrooke, Tortolita, Catalina State Park, Catalina Foothills, Picture Rocks, Oracle Junction, Biosphere 2 and Dove Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
